text: Jason Terrance Phillips known by his stage name Jadakiss, (born May 27, 1975) is an American rapper. Jadakiss joined the rap group The Lox in 1994, which became popular in 1997. In 1999, Jadakiss joined the Ruff Ryders as well. == Albums == Studio albums * Kiss tha Game Goodbye (2001) * Kiss of Death (2004) * The Last Kiss (2009) * Top 5 Dead or Alive (2015) * Ignatius (2020) Collaboration albums * Friday on Elm Street (with Fabolous) (2017) Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century American musicians Category:20th-century American rappers Category:21st-century American musicians Category:21st-century American rappers Category:African- American rappers Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Gangsta rappers Category:Interscope Records artists Category:Musicians from New York City Category:People from Yonkers, New York Category:Rappers from New York (state) Category:Hardcore hip hop artists
title: Jadakiss
